mapper.sql: id, roadName, roadLevel, currentSpeed, diff, lastHourAvgSpeed, lastWeekAvgSpeed, color
mapper.insert: insert into road_condition (id, roadName, roadLevel, currentSpeed, diff, lastHourAvgSpeed, lastWeekAvgSpeed, color) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{roadname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{roadlevel,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{currentspeed,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{diff,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{lasthouravgspeed,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{lastweekavgspeed,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{color,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update road_condition
roadName = #{roadname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
roadLevel = #{roadlevel,jdbcType=TINYINT},
currentSpeed = #{currentspeed,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
diff = #{diff,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
lastHourAvgSpeed = #{lasthouravgspeed,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
lastWeekAvgSpeed = #{lastweekavgspeed,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
color = #{color,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
